instructions.title: How It Works
instructions.step1: Select your preferred reading type (Coffee Cup or Tarot)
instructions.step2: Click 'Start Call' to connect with Baba Mara
instructions.step4: Ask your questions naturally through voice
instructions.step5: Listen to Baba Mara's mystical guidance in real-time
